column3: News;Kampong Cham:------ A large fire broke out on scrub land at 10:45 am on 08 November 2018
column4: to east of Beong Kok pagoda in Kampong Cham Province. The fire spread rapidly around the lake.------The provincial fire fighting police cooperated with the Kampong Chhnang provincial police managed to control the blaze
column6: the fire was out.------ ------With timely intervention
column8: there was no damage to property or injury to citizens.------https://www.postnews.com.kh/local/385354------
